bought this hub because it had the perfect combination of ports for my macbook pro running big sur   ethernet  hdmi for a monitor  and two usbs for mouse and keyboard  the usb c power delivery was a bonus  but not necessary for me because i have two usb c ports i ordered this hub because my old ethernet to usb     adapter stopped working when i updated my macbook to big sur  driverkit update   this hub  however  works with big sur and lets me use ethernet again  i m getting my normal speed of     mbps  so i don t actually know if the adapter provides gigabit ethernet  but it definitely seems to work at speeds over    mbps  the hdmi lets me do     p    hz  i m not sure if it will do    hz with a different computer  but i think that s the maximum my mac can do it gets a little warm  but that s to be expected with the power delivery  and it has not gotten alarmingly hot yet  the exterior is metal and looks feels pretty nice  which probably also helps with heat dissipation
